content.rendered:
John MacAskill, Group Marketing Director of the AqualisBraemar LOC group, spoke with Energy Voice to look back at the great strides floating wind has made in 2020, from using the latest generation of wind turbines to new oil and gas entrants and emerging floating markets. John also discussed some of the challenges lying ahead for the next few years. 

Follow this link to read the full article.

excerpt.rendered: John MacAskill, Group Marketing Director of the AqualisBraemar LOC group, spoke with Energy Voice to look back at the great strides floating wind has made in 2020, from using the latest generation of wind turbines to new oil and gas entrants and emerging floating markets.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar appoints group marketing director
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has appointed John MacAskill its first group marketing director.

jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC to support Erebus floating wind farm
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: OWC has entered into a contract to provide engineering services for Simply Blue Energy and Total’s Erebus floating wind project located in the Celtic Sea offshore Wales, UK.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar to acquire LOC Group
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar ASA has entered into an agreement to acquire 100 percent of the shares in LOC Group, thereby creating a leading global independent offshore energy and marine consultancy.

jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC tasked with floating wind technology review
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: OWC closely follows the development of around 40 technology solutions for floating wind platforms. Under this contract, OWC will assess the technology readiness level of each.

jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC expands offshore wind offering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Renewables consultancy firm OWC sets up its own energy yield assessment service capability for offshore wind projects, providing an additional integrated service offering to developers.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Wind Consultants rebrand to OWC
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Offshore Wind Consultants Ltd, a wholly-owned subsidiary of AqualisBraemar ASA, is rebranding to a new name: OWC
